name: Nintendo Switch Sports: Basketball
summary: Use motion controls to sink as many baskets as you can within the time limit in the solo Three-Point Challenge. If you’re looking for friendly competition, then up to four players can compete in Five-Streak Battle or Three-Point Contest, and you can dribble, pass and score in two-on-two matches.
